posts.post_title: WTB -N172 Jim Burns or Myron Allen (specific poses below)?
posts.post_content:

N172 Jim Burns sliding pose(#56-6)
 or
N172 Myron Allen as a member of Kansas City as he bends poised to catch a ball (Pose #4-3
